insert into t_match ( id ,team_name ,team_name_hk ,team_name_hk_s ,team_name_en ,country ,pic )
select #{team.id}, #{team.team_name}, #{team.team_name_hk}, #{team.team_name_hk_s}, #{team.team_name_en}, #{team.country}, #{team.pic}
from dual
on duplicate key update match_id=VALUES(match_id),update_time=now()
